00108     public function OnLoad ( )
00109         {
00110                 parent::OnLoad();
00111                 
00112                 $DBVars =  & $this->GetApplication()->GetVariables();
00113                 $DBVars = & $DBVars[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ];
00114                 
00115                 $this->initializeDatabasesConnections( $DBVars, MYSQL_CONF_BASE );
00116                 
00117                 
00118                 $confConnexion = $this->GetConfigurationDatabaseConnection( );
00119                 
00120                 $className = $DBVars[ MYSQL_CONF_BASE ][ 'type' ].'TableVariable';
00121                 $configuration = new $className ( CONFIGURATION_TABLE_NAME, $confConnection, $errors );
00122 
00123                 unset ( $DBVars );
00124                 unset ( $className );
00125                 unset ( $confConnection );
00126                 
00127                 $servConf = $configuration->SelectServerVariables();
00128                 $siteConf = $configuration->SelectSiteVariables( IDSITE );
00129                 
00130                 unset ( $configuration );
00131                 
00132                 if ( $siteConf InstanceOf Errors || $servConf InstanceOf Errors )
00133                 {
00134                         echo ( $siteConf . $servConf );
00135                 }
00136                 else
00137                 {
00138                         $conf = $servConf;
00139                         
00140                         foreach ( $siteConf as $siteVar )
00141                         {
00142                                 $conf->Add ( $siteVar );
00143                         }
00144                 
00145                         // load Server configuration
00146                         $this->GetApplication()->SetConfiguration( $conf );
00147                         
00148                         unset ( $conf );
00149                 }
00150                 
00151                 unset ( $servConf );
00152                 unset ( $siteConf );
00153 
00154                 $sessionsActivated = $this->GetApplication()->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_SESSIONS_ACTIVATED );
00155                 
00156                 
00157                 $this->GetTemplate()->GetHeaders()->AddHeaders( '<title>'.$this->GetApplication()->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_TITLE )->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ).'</title>' );
00158                 $this->GetTemplate()->GetHeaders()->AddHeaders( '<meta http-equiv="desc" content="'.$this->GetApplication()->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_DESCRIPTION )->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ).'" />' );
00159                 $this->GetTemplate()->GetHeaders()->AddHeaders( '<meta http-equiv="keywords" content="'.$this->GetApplication()->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_KEYWORDS )->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ).'" />' );
00160                 
00161                 if ( ! ($sessionsActivated InstanceOf Errors) && $sessionsActivated->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ) )
00162                 {
00163                         // activate sessions
00164                         $this->session = Session::GetInstance();
00165                 }
00166                 
00167                 unset ( $sessionsActivated );
00168         } //---- End of OnLoad

00232 //------------------------------------------------------ protected methods
00243         protected function initializeDatabasesConnections( & $DBVars, $confDBIndex )
00244         {               
00245                 $this->confDatabaseConnection = NULL;
00246         
00247                 // set up all 'always' needed connections
00248                 foreach ( $DBVars as $index => $db )
00249                 {
00250                         if ( $db['alwaysUse'] )
00251                         {
00252                                 // set up
00253                                 $className = $db[ 'type' ].'Connection';
00254                                 $newDB = new $className ( ) or ($errors = new Errors());
00255                                 
00256                                 $newDB->SetServer( $db['host'] );
00257                                 $newDB->SetUsername( $db['login'] );
00258                                 $newDB->SetPassword( $db['password'] );
00259                                 
00260                                 $newDB->Open( BDDConnection::CONNECTION_PERSISTENT );
00261                                 
00262                                 $errors = $newDB->SetDatabase( $db['database'] );
00263                                 
00264                                 if ( $errors == NULL )
00265                                 {
00266                                         $this->databasesConnections[] = & $newDB;
00267                                         
00268                                         if ( $index == $confDBIndex )
00269                                         {
00270                                                 $this->confDatabaseConnection = & $newDB;
00271                                         }
00272                                 }
00273                                 else
00274                                 {
00275                                         die ( $errors );
00276                                 }
00277                                 
00278                                 unset ( $newDB );
00279                         }
00280                 }
00281         } //----- End of initializeDatabasesConnections
